subject: College Athletics
Football
Scholarships and Fellowships
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. rejected Southern California’s appeal to reduce sanctions imposed on its football program, keeping in place some of the harshest penalties in a quarter-century.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. rejected Southern California’s appeal to reduce sanctions imposed on its football program, keeping in place some of the harshest penalties in a quarter-century.
